meaningMnemonic: After a <radical>tsunami</radical> hit your <radical>farming</radical> land, you're gonna see a lot of <kanji>dense</kanji> silt left behind. This <kanji>thick</kanji> layer really enriches the soil, and your crops will come out tasting extra thick and dense in flavor.
readingMnemonic: Know who’s likely responsible for this <kanji>dense</kanji>, <kanji>thick</kanji> layer of silt? <reading>No</reading>stradamus (のう). He’s the one who urged you to buy this farmland in the first place, likely because he predicted the tsunami would bring this thick layer of silt.
